# suffix()

**Instance Method**

Returns the UTF8Span containing all the content after the iterator’s current position.

## Declaration

```swift
func suffix() -> UTF8Span
```

## Discussion

The resultant `UTF8Span` has the same lifetime constraints as `self`.
title: suffix()
